title: Penunggu Gunung Raya
resume: Gunung Raya is a drama series set in a village called Gunung Raya. This horror mystery centers around four individuals, Azam, Intan, Mas and Omar, who each respectively are haunted by dreams of ancient folktales or legends. All four of them had once committed a heinous act when they lived at the village together as children. While growing up as kids, they were often bullied by the village chief’s son, Dayak (Imran Atta). One day, the four kids had lured Dayak to a haunted well deep within the thick of a forest. Dayak fell into the well and met his death.Unbeknownst to anyone, Dayak’s blood had unleashed a terrifying entity that lay deep within the well, ie the evil spirit of Gunung Raya, who was locked up in a Pandora’s box in the well. However, with the skillful mentoring of Lebai Awang, a master of wizardry, the four friends managed to defeat the evil spirit. But as a result of this clash with the devil, they had lost their memory and had no recollection of their past. The four friends are sent to the big city where they start life anew. But back at the village of Gunung Raya, Tok Sumun, the village chief, whose son, Dayak, had died, is hell-bent on avenging his son’s death. So, he casts free, the evil spirit of Gunung Raya once again, to wreck terrifying havoc upon the lives of his son’s killers. Haunted by terrifying dreams of the past, Azam, Intan, Mas, and Omar live their lives in fear of the evil curse set upon them and what lies in wait for them. Their past sins have come back to haunt them.
